description: This file defines core domain models for a Support backend system, including schemas for tickets, comments, and knowledge base articles using Pydantic models. It provides data validation and structure for API communication and internal processing, focusing on support ticket management.

classes.name: Comment
classes.description: A comment associated with a support ticket, containing an ID, author, message, and timestamp.

classes.name: CommentCreate
classes.description: Payload model for creating a new comment, includes relevant fields except ID and timestamps.

classes.name: Ticket
classes.description: Represents a support ticket including ID, title, description, status, creator info, timestamps, and tags.

classes.name: TicketCreate
classes.description: Payload for creating a new support ticket, with required fields but no IDs or timestamps.

classes.name: TicketUpdate
classes.description: Payload for updating existing tickets with optional fields for partial updates.

classes.name: KBArticle
classes.description: A knowledge base article including ID, title, content, timestamps, and tags.

classes.name: KBArticleCreate
classes.description: Payload model for creating a new KB article with title, content, and tags.

classes.name: KBArticleUpdate
classes.description: Payload for updating existing KB articles with optional fields.
